Content: Opposition Leader Mahinda Rajapaksa has said that he wished to take this opportunity to remind everyone that they should unite to create a truly non-dependent Sri Lanka, a country that is self-sufficient and bold enough to not let external forces try to divide itself based on their vested interests. The Leader of the Opposition said that although Independence Day is the day we achieved independence from the British, by spirit, it serves as a reminder that Sri Lankans are first and foremost, one.
